mapper.select: select * from (select id,name,dept_name,position_name,dept_code from st.member join st.department using(dept_code) join st.position using(position_code)) where dept_code = (select dept_code from st.member where id=#{id})
select * from st.approval_type where app_type_name like '%'||'업무일지'||'%' order by app_type_code
